html.label: Intro
html.p:
HELLO AND WELCOME TO OUR SURVEY!
THANK YOU IN ADVANCE FOR YOUR PARTICIPATION. THIS STUDY IS VERY IMPORTANT TO US AND WE ASK THAT YOU ANSWER EACH QUESTION CAREFULLY AND COMPLETELY. PLEASE REMEMBER THAT THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. WE ARE ONLY INTERESTED IN YOUR OPINIONS.
USE THE SCROLL BAR ON THE RIGHT AND BOTTOM OF YOUR SCREEN TO MOVE UP AND DOWN THROUGH QUESTIONS AND IMAGES.
LET’S BEGIN…

radio.label: S_Gender
radio.title: With which gender do you identify?

radio.label: S_Children
radio.title: Do you currently have any children living in your household?

radio.label: S_NumberChildren
radio.title: How many children live in your household?

checkbox.label: S_ChildrenAge
checkbox.title: What are the ages of the children living in your household?
checkbox.validate: if (S_NumberChildren.r1 and S_ChildrenAge.count ge 2): error("You mentioned you have one child, please select an age range only.")

radio.label: S_ParentingStyle
radio.title: How would you describe your parenting style?
radio.row: I am using what information I already know to raise my child(ren)
I do a lot of research on how to best provide for my child(ren)
I have learned what best to do from hands-on experience raising my older child(ren)
I tend to seek doctor's recommendations when it comes to my child(ren)'s health and wellness
I tend to seek family/friends' advice and suggesstions when it comes to my child(ren)'s health and wellness
I look to influencers in culture to help me with decisions I need to make about raising my child(ren)

select.label: S_Shopping
select.title: How much of the household’s shopping related to needs of the children in the household do you, yourself, do?

radio.label: S_Feeding
radio.title: Which of the following statements best describes how you, yourself, currently feed your 0-12 month old child?
radio.row: I mainly breastfeed and supplement with infant formula
I mainly feed infant formula and supplement with breast milk

checkbox.label: S_ParentConcerns
checkbox.title: As a parent to an infant 0-12 months, what are some concerns you have for your child?
checkbox.row: Food Allergies (excluding cow's milk protein allergies)
Non-food Allergies such as dust, pollen, or pets
Growth (e.g. underweight, stunted growth or shortage of height)

checkbox.label: S_Severity
checkbox.title: Which, if any, of these symptoms has your infant experienced in the past 6 months?
checkbox.row: Eosinophilic esophagitis (difficulty swallowing due to an inflamed esophagus)
Anaphylaxsis (an allergic reaction in which the windpipe swells shut, preventing breathing)

row.label: r1
row.autofill: (S_Severity.r8 or S_Severity.r9 or S_Severity.r10 or S_Severity.r11 or S_Severity.r12)

row.label: r2
row.autofill: not(S_Severity.r8 or S_Severity.r9 or S_Severity.r10 or S_Severity.r11 or S_Severity.r12)

checkbox.label: S_Reaction
checkbox.title: Related to the symptoms your infant has experienced in the past 6 months, which of the below, if any, have you done/are you doing?
checkbox.validate: if (S_Reaction.r4 and S_Reaction.r5): error("You should not select Changed /changing the baby's formula upon recommendation and without recommendation at the same time. Please check your answers.")
checkbox.row: Sought/ seeking guidance from healthcare provider about your child's symptoms
Sought/ seeking guidance from online sources
Changed /changing the baby's formula upon recommendation from a Health Care Provider or others
Changed / changing the baby's formula without any recommendation from a Health Care Provider or others

radio.label: S_Diagnosis
radio.title: You said you sought/are seeking guidance from a health care provider about your infant’s symptoms. What was the outcome of this visit? If your health care provider referred you to a specialist, please refer to that appointment.
radio.row: The health care provider gave a diagnosis.
The health care provider did not give a diagnosis.

radio.label: S_Diagnosis_CMPA
radio.title: What was the diagnosis you were given by your health care provider?
radio.row: Severe/complex cow's milk protein allergy (CMPA), or whey or casein allergy.

checkbox.label: S_NoDiagnosis
checkbox.title: What do you believe was/is the cause of your child’s symptoms?
checkbox.row: I suspect my child has celiac disease or an allergy to gluten.
I suspect my child has an allergy to nuts.
I suspect my child has lactose intolerance.
I suspect my child has cow's milk protein allergy (CMPA), casein or whey allergy
I suspect my child has gastrointestinal or digestive issues
I am not sure what the cause is

radio.label: S_Status
radio.title: Which of the below best describes your current situation related to your child’s symptoms?
radio.row: My child has symptoms but I don't plan on treating them / making dietary management changes.
I'm not sure what's causing my child's symptoms or how to treat them.
I have some understanding of what's causing my child's symptoms and I'm exploring options on how to treat them
I am in the process of treating the symptoms but so far I have not found the solution which resolves the symptoms, it takes too long to figure it out
I am in the process of treating my child's symptoms and we are seeing some improvement of the symptoms, but I'm still concerned if the symptoms will persist
I am in the process of treating my child's symptoms and we are seeing some improvement of the symptoms
I know what was causing my child symptoms and treatment successfully resolved the symptoms.
I know what was causing my child's symptoms and treatment successfully resolved the symptoms, but I'm still worried if the symptoms will come back in the future

checkbox.label: S_Status_nets
checkbox.title: S_Status nets.
checkbox.virtual: if S_Status.r1 : S_Status_nets.r1.val = 1 if S_Status.r2 or S_Status.r3 or S_Status.r4 or S_Status.r5 or S_Status.r6 or S_Status.r9: S_Status_nets.r2.val = 1 if S_Status.r7 or S_Status.r8: S_Status_nets.r3.val = 1
checkbox.row: Confused or In Process of Treatment

radio.label: S_Familiar
radio.title: Before today, how familiar would you say you were with the following infant nutrition products?
radio.comment: Select one for each of the below products.

checkbox.label: S_Brands_Aware
checkbox.title: Which brand(s) of specialized infant formulas are you aware of?

checkbox.label: S_Brands_Purchased
checkbox.title: Which brand(s) of specialized infant formulas have you purchased and used in the past?

comment.i: Please only select products you have bought for yourself rather than any samples or free gifts you have received.

radio.label: S_Brands_Most_Recent
radio.title: Which brand of specialized infant formulas are you currently using the most often?

checkbox.label: hid_MostRecent
checkbox.title: hidden question ////selected options from S_Brands_Most_Recent used for piping

checkbox.label: Purchased
checkbox.title: hidden question ////selected options from S_Brands_Most_Recent used for piping

row.label: r8
row.autofill: not(S_Brands_Most_Recent.r7 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r8 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r9 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r10 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r11 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r12)

row.label: r9
row.autofill: not(S_Brands_Most_Recent.r13 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r14 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r15 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r16 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r17)

row.label: r10
row.autofill: (S_Brands_Most_Recent.r7 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r8 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r9 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r10 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r11 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r12)

row.label: r11
row.autofill: (S_Brands_Most_Recent.r13 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r14 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r15 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r16 or S_Brands_Most_Recent.r17)

radio.label: S_BRAND_GUIDANCE
radio.title: You mentioned just now, you are currently using [pipe:hid_MostRecent] most often for your infant? How did you decide on that brand?
radio.row: The brand was a recommendation from a health care provider (i.e. pediatrician, nurse, pharmacist…etc)
I chose the brand of formula

radio.label: S_INSURANCE
radio.title: Do you/did you have insurance coverage for specialized infant formulas?

autofill.label: hidshopper
autofill.title: Sample
autofill.row: All or it, or Half of it or more

checkbox.label: hid_feeding
checkbox.title: hidden question
checkbox.row: Formula, or mixed breastfeeding and formula users

survey.exec: if SampleQ.r1: Sample.val=0 if SampleQ.r2: Sample.val=1

radio.label: Sample
radio.title: Phase

block.label: AgreementBlock
block.note: THIS QUESTION SHOULD BE LEFT IN TO ENSURE QUALITY OF INTERVIEWING AND THAT IT'S NOT A BOT TAKING THE SURVEY

radio.label: Agreement1
radio.title:
Respondent Confidentiality Disclosure Agreement (RCDA)
Congratulations!
Thank you for agreeing to participate in this consumer study on behalf of Behaviorally, formerly PRS. Before you can participate in this research, we would like you to understand that it will involve Confidential Information and you must agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, you will not be eligible to participate in this study. By signing this agreement, you agree as follows:
You will use information or material disclosed to you or which may be available as part of this study only for the purpose of participating in this study, and you will not otherwise use the information or material for your own benefit or the benefit of any third party.
You agree to keep confidential and not disclose, copy, transmit, or use for any purpose other than your participation in this study any information or material disclosed or made available to you as part of the study, including about products or packaging that may be disclosed to you directly or indirectly by participating in this study. Any disclosure, copying, transmitting or misuse of any information or material in any form (including hard copy and/or electronic/data) whether intentional or unintentional may subject you to disqualification, and any other remedies available to Behaviorally or its study partners in law or equity.
You agree that Behaviorally (and its partners) will be irreparably harmed and monetary damages may not be adequate compensation if you fail to meet your obligations under this agreement, and that, in addition to other remedies, Behaviorally (or its partners) shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief to prevent any threatened or continued breach. The parties hereby waive any requirements for security for obtaining any provisional relief.
Each of Behaviorally’s partners is an intended third-party beneficiary of this agreement and each partner may enforce the terms of this agreement.
As further detailed in our privacy policy (https://www.behaviorally.com/privacy-policy), we take reasonable precautions to protect the privacy and security of your information during the market research survey. All information collected as part of this survey is treated in accordance with our online privacy policy and is destroyed 2 years after you have taken this survey. You will be compensated for your time, commitment, and confidential obligation.
Please confirm your acceptance of these terms by checking the agreement below.

row.label: r1
row.b: I hereby acknowledge and agree to the terms.

from datetime import datetime
cur_time = datetime.now() DateTime.val = cur_time.strftime("%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S")

checkbox.label: Q_SymptomsOnset
checkbox.title: Which symptoms did you first notice in your child?
checkbox.row: Eosinophilic esophagitis (difficulty swallowing due to an inflamed esophagus)
Anaphylaxsis (an allergic reaction in which the windpipe swells shut, preventing breathing)

radio.label: Q_AgeOfOnset
radio.title: At what age did you first notice these symptoms in your child?

radio.label: Q_Feelings1
radio.title: And how did you feel when your child was first experiencing these symptoms?
radio.comment: Please select the image that best reflects the emotion you were feeling.

checkbox.label: Q_ReactionGuidance
checkbox.title: Thinking about when you first noticed the symptoms in your child, how did you seek guidance?
checkbox.row: Sought guidance from healthcare provider about your child's symptoms
Sought guidance/conducted research using online sources
Sought guidance from other source (Please specify)

checkbox.label: Q_ReactionGuidance2
checkbox.title: Which healthcare provider did you consult?

checkbox.label: Q_ReactionOnset
checkbox.title: And which, if any, of the following actions did you take after you noticed the symptoms in your child?
checkbox.row: I changed the brand of routine formula I was feeding my baby.
I switched from a routine formula to a specialized formula.
I changed the solid foods I was feeding my baby.
I reduced the amount of baby formula I was giving my child and breastfed more
I reduced the amount of breastmilk I was giving my child and have more baby formula
I switched from breastfeeding my baby to a routine formula.
I changed my diet in case the breastmilk was impacting my child

checkbox.label: Q_ReactionOnset_Influence
checkbox.title: Did you decide to take the action by yourself or based on a recommendation/guidance?
checkbox.row: Sought guidance from healthcare provider about your child's symptoms
Sought guidance/conducted research using online sources
checkbox.col: I changed the brand of routine formula I was feeding my baby.
I switched from a routine formula to a specialized formula.
I changed the solid foods I was feeding my baby.
I reduced the amount of baby formula I was giving my child and breastfed more
I reduced the amount of breastmilk I was giving my child and have more baby formula
I switched from breastfeeding my baby to a routine formula.
I changed my diet in case the breastmilk was impacting my child

checkbox.label: Q_Research_Specific
checkbox.title: Where did you conduct research online?
checkbox.row: Healthcare organizations such as Mayo Clinic, the CDC, NHS, etc.
Baby brand sites such as Pampers, etc.
Baby/parenting sites such as Whattoexpect.com, babycenter.com, etc.

radio.label: Q_TimeToHCP
radio.title: After the onset of symptoms, when did you seek guidance from a healthcare provider?
radio.row: After 3 or more months of experiencing symptoms

checkbox.label: Q_HCP_GOALS
checkbox.title: What were your goals for your appointment with your healthcare provider?
checkbox.row: I had one diagnosis in mind, and I wanted to confirm it.
I had multiple potential diagnoses in mind, and I wanted to identify the correct one.
I had no diagnosis in mind and wanted guidance.
I wanted my provider's opinion on my new formula choice.
I wanted to get a referral to see a specialist.

checkbox.label: Q_HCP_VISIT
checkbox.title: Which, if any, of the following did your healthcare provider do at your appointment?
checkbox.row: Gave me informational literature (pamphlets, print outs)
Recommended a specific brand of formula.
Recommended a category of formula (EHF, AA, etc.)
Made a referral to a specialist.
Asked about my family history of allergies.
Pointed me to a website where I could learn more.
Suggested a parent support group to join.

radio.label: S_DiagnosisGiven_Initial
radio.title: What was the first diagnosis given by your health care provider?
radio.row: A mild or moderate Cow's Milk Protein, whey or casein allergy
Severe/complex Cow's Milk Protein, whey, or caesin allergy

radio.label: S_RecommendationGiven_Initial
radio.title: What was the recommended formula brand given by your health care provider?

radio.label: Q_Feelings2
radio.title: And how did you feel after your visit to your healthcare provider?
radio.comment: Please select the image that best reflects the emotion you were feeling.

checkbox.label: Q_Reaction_HCP
checkbox.title: Which, if any, of the following actions did you take after visiting your healthcare provider?
checkbox.row: I made an appointment with another general pediatrician for a second opinion
I made an appointment with another OB-GYN for a second opinion
I made an appointment with a healthcare specialist (e.g. pediatric allergist, pediatric gastroenterologist.)
Sought guidance/conducted research using online sources
I changed the brand of formula I was feeding my baby.
I changed to using an Extensively Hydrolyzed Infant Formulas (EHFs)
I changed to using an Amino Acid Infant Formula
I changed the solid foods I was feeding my baby.
I reduced the amount of baby formula I was giving my child and breastfed more
I reduced the amount of breastmilk I was giving my child and have more baby formula
I changed my diet in case the breastmilk was impacting my child

radio.label: Q_Research
radio.cond: Q_Reaction_HCP.r7 or Q_Reaction_HCP.r8 or Q_ReactionOnset.r1 or Q_ReactionOnset.r2
radio.title: Did you conduct any additional research about specialized infant formulas to address your baby’s symptoms (such as looking at ratings, reviews, prices or product information) before making a purchase?

Visit the social media site of a brand
Watch an online video, e.g., On Youtube
Ask for recommendations on social media

Seek out additional information about a product
Check availability or if product is in stock
Seek out nutritional information about the product
Seek out health benefits of product

Check the product is in stock/available
Read ingredients on packaging (benefits, ingredients, nutrition, etc.)

html.label: Classification
html.i: Now, just a few questions for classification purposes…

radio.label: C_Ethnicity
radio.title: Please select one of these races/ethnicities that best describes you.

number.label: C_Household
number.title: How many people, including yourself, are currently living in your household in the following age ranges?
number.comment: Please enter a whole number for each. Enter 0 if the answer is 0, do not leave any option blank.
number.validate:
if not(C_Household.r1.val ge 0) or not(C_Household.r2.val ge 0) or not(C_Household.r3.val ge 0): error("If the answer is 0, please enter 0.")
if (C_Household.r4.val lt 1): error("As it includes you, there must be at least 1 member who is 18+, please check your answer.")

select.label: C_STANDARD_EDUCATION
select.title: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
select.choice: Other post high school vocational training
Completed some college, but no degree
Completed some graduate, but no degree

select.label: STANDARD_INCOME
select.title: Please select the range that best represents your total annual household income.

radio.label: S_Recontact_Will
radio.title:
You are eligible to participate in a follow-up online market research discussion on consumer products. This is not an attempt to sell you anything -- this is strictly a research study. This is also an opportunity to express your thoughts, opinions and ideas to a company that is interested in what you have to say.
The 15 to 20 minute discussion would take place over a live online video call with a certified moderator, and would require you to use a laptop or desktop computer (not a mobile device or tablet). You will receive an additional incentive of [pipe: QualPrice] for participating in this discussion.
If selected, you will be notified within 1 week, at which point you will receive details regarding when the discussion will take place. Would you be willing to participate?

radio.label: S_Recontact_CAM
radio.title: Does your laptop or desktop computer have a functioning web cam?

radio.label: S_Recontact_SPEED
radio.title: Please select the response that best describes your internet connection.
radio.row: High-Performance Internet (any service faster than standard Cable)

text.label: S_Recontact_INFO
text.cond: not(gv.isSST()) and (S_Recontact_SPEED.r2 or S_Recontact_SPEED.r3 or S_Recontact_SPEED.r4)
text.title: Please provide your contact information so that we may contact you if selected.

radio.label: S_Recontact_TimeZone
radio.title: Please select your time zone.

html.label: S_Recontact_End
html.cond: not(gv.isSST()) and (S_Recontact_SPEED.r2 or S_Recontact_SPEED.r3 or S_Recontact_SPEED.r4)
html.strong:
Thank you for this information!
Thank you for participation! You have been determined eligible for the online discussion mentioned earlier. If selected, we will contact you within 1 week, at which point you will receive details regarding when the discussion will take place.

i.strong: Thank you for your time and cooperation!
